page.title: 11The Post Office
page.content: The shop closed early this year and now only a limited post office service remains for postage, family allowance, TV licenses, National Insurance stamps, telephone accounts, and Nat'l Savings Certificates. The post office is open from 9.30-12.00 & 1.30-4.00 daily and there is a postal collection every day. The postmaster does not handle as many cash transactions or do as much business as he did and he expressed concern about attacks by thieves on sub-post offices. He has to give 3 months notice of proposed closure of the Post Office. He still sells long-life milk, eggs and cigarettes, and he and his wife run a bed and breakfast business in the premises at Drove House on the Old Drove Road.
